name: Vaporize
description:
VAPORIZE is a neoclassical top-down shooter with all the thrill of a coin-op arcade and none of the quarters. Learn the controls in seconds as you pilot a ship against endless waves of unknown forces. How long can you survive before you get ...vaporized? 

-- Features by the Bullet -- 

  • Easy to master controls anyone can learn
  • A robust difficulty system  that stays challenging and keeps you coming back for more, including a dynamic, adaptive health system
  • Gorgeous particle effects made to feel like a high resolution LCD handheld
  • A thumping soundtrack by the brilliantly talented Nihilore 
  • Completely original sound effects, all designed and recorded just for this game
  • Beautifully minimalist ship designs for a whole array of enemy types
  • Compatibility with both Mac and Windows
